channel.title: Hello, I’m Doug Grubba from VisualChefs
channel.description:
Hi all,
Looks like I broken the rules too. Sorry about that.
I'm a Sr. Web Dev @ VisualChefs. Great idea for the site. I usually am just talking about the technical side of things so hopefully I can learn a bit. :smile:
I see lot of friendly and familiar faces but hopefully I get to talk to some new people too!
Doug

item.title: Hello, I’m Doug Grubba from VisualChefs
item.dc:creator: douggdev
item.description:
Thanks guys. Great idea here. Some pretty interesting topics.

Read full topic
